law.catch_line: Mobile Radio Telephone Service; Certification; Exemptions

text.section: an extension of a system within any authorized service area within which a radio utility has theretofore lawfully operated;
an extension within or to an authorized service area already served by the radio utility, necessary in the ordinary course of business;
the replacement of facilities within or to any authorized service area already served by a utility;

an extension into an area contiguous to that already served by a radio utility which is not the recipient of mobile radio telephone service from another radio utility, if no certificate for service in such contiguous area has been issued to or applied for by any other radio utility;
the acquisition and operation of any mobile radio utility system for which a certificate had been issued for previous construction and operation by a radio utility.
